description: Python is a programming language that is used to create programs that can be run on a computer. It is a high-level language that is easy to learn and use. Python is a great choice for beginners who want to learn programming.

description: This course will explore the history, approach, and philosophy of Agile project management, including the Scrum framework. You will learn how to differentiate and blend Agile and other project management approaches.

lessons.description: This course will explore the history, approach, and philosophy of Agile project management, including the Scrum framework. You will learn how to differentiate and blend Agile and other project management approaches.

Kanban is a method of managing a project that is based on the idea of cards. The cards are used to represent the different phases of the project. The cards are usually colored to indicate the phase of the project. The cards are usually numbered to indicate the order of the phases.
